appDisplayName: Synology Active Backup for Business Agent
description:
Active Backup for Business is an all-in-one backup solution for Synology NAS, designed for streamlining and enhancing data protection in businesses' diverse IT environments.

Active Backup for Business Agent must be installed on every Windows device, Mac computer, and Linux physical server you want to protect. You can perform a set of administration, including task management and template configuration, in Active Backup for Business console.
Compatibility and Installation
1. Updated to be compatible with Active Backup for Business 2.7.1.
Important Note
1. To ensure data integrity, Active Backup for Business will perform a full backup of Windows PCs and physical servers during the initial backup after updating to version 2.7.1 or above.
What's new
1. Enhanced backup performance for macOS 14.
Fixed Issues
1. Fixed an issue where extending volumes on Windows might result in incomplete backups.
2. Fixed an issue where backing up multiple block devices on the same general disk on Linux might result in incomplete backups.
3. Fixed an issue where backing up Macs with OpenCore Legacy Patcher might fail.
4. Fixed an issue where file restorations might fail.
